titles.title: Group Health Plan Disclosure Act of 1999

To amend title I of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to ensure proper disclosure to participants and beneficiaries under group health plans covered under such title of limitations placed by such title on certain protections that would otherwise apply under State law.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 6/9/1999--Introduced. Group Health Plan Disclosure Act of 1999 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to require covered group health plans to give their participants and beneficiaries an annual separate written notice of ERISA limitations on certain protections that would otherwise apply under State law.
